sentences.sentence: The pair shares a vitriolic relationship which is hardly romantic, but it showcases some of their finest work as they head to some dark places as a couple.
sentences.translation: 这对夫妻刻薄的关系并不浪漫，但这也展示了他们作为夫妻前往一些黑暗的地方时最出色的作品。

sentences.sentence: The newspaper launched a vitriolic attack on the president.
sentences.translation: 这家报纸对总统发起了一场恶意的攻击。

sentences.sentence: There was a vicious and vitriolic attack on him in one of the Sunday newspapers two weeks ago.
sentences.translation: 两周前的一份周日报纸上刊登了一篇对他进行尖酸刻薄攻击的文章。
